name: Air Andrew Ltd.
about: Air Andrew Ltd. is a second-generation aviation family business based in Virden and Brandon, Manitoba, Canada. Since 2003, we have specialized in professional pilot training, focusing on ground training, flight training, and checks/exams. Our fleet includes twin Cessna aircraft and a Cessna 340 with a complete Garmin flight deck, preparing students for advanced flight deck roles. We offer a range of training programs, including Discovery Flights, Seaplane Ratings, Instructor Ratings, and Tail Wheel Training. Operating in low traffic volume airspace with access to instrument landing system (ILS) approaches, we provide an ideal learning environment. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art equipment ensure students excel in their aviation careers. At Air Andrew Ltd., we are committed to helping our students achieve their flying goals with excellence and safety.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Multi-Pilot License (MPL)
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Seaplane Rating
Night Rating"]
